1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Attribute getters: Extract attribute from use of relmap.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Rel
6  ( -- * Relmap
7    getRelmap, getOptRelmap,
8
9    -- * Term
10    getTerm, getTerm2, getTermOpt,
11    getTerms, getTermsCo,
12    getTermPairs, getTermsColon,
13    getTermTrees,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get      as Rop
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
20
21
22-- ----------------------  Relmap
23
24-- | Get a relmap from operator use.
25--
26--   > consMeet :: (Ord c) => RopCons c
27--   > consMeet med = do
28--   >   m <- getRelmap med "-relmap"
29--   >   Right $ relmapMeet med m
30--
31getRelmap :: Rop.RopGet c (C.Relmap c)
32getRelmap med name =
33    case lookup name $ C.medSubmap med of
34      Nothing -> Msg.reqRelmap 1
35      Just m  -> Right m
36
37-- | Get optional relmap.
38getOptRelmap :: C.Relmap c -> Rop.RopGet c (C.Relmap c)
39getOptRelmap rmap0 med = right rmap0 . getRelmap med
40
41-- | Replace 'Left' value to 'Right' value.
42right :: b -> K.Map (Either a b)
43right _ (Right x) = Right x
44right x (Left _)  = Right x
45
46
47-- ----------------------  Term
48
49-- | Get a term name from named attribute.
50getTerm :: Rop.RopGet c K.TermName
51getTerm = Rop.getFromTree get where
52    get [x] = K.treeFlatName x
53    get _   = Msg.unexpAttr "Require one term"
54
55-- | Get two term names.
56getTerm2 :: Rop.RopGet c (K.TermName, K.TermName)
57getTerm2 med n =
58    do terms <- getTerms med n
59       case terms of
60         [x,y] -> Right (x, y)
61         _     -> Msg.unexpAttr "Require two term"
62
63-- | Get optional term name.
64getTermOpt :: Rop.RopGet c (Maybe K.TermName)
65getTermOpt = Rop.getMaybe getTerm
66
67-- | Get list of term names from named attribute.
68getTerms :: Rop.RopGet c [K.TermName]
69getTerms = Rop.getFromTree K.treesFlatNames
70
71-- | Get term names and complement sign (@~@) .
72getTermsCo :: Rop.RopGet c (Bool, [K.TermName])
73getTermsCo = Rop.getFromTree K.treesFlatNamesCo
74
75-- | Get list of term-name pairs from named attribute.
76getTermPairs :: Rop.RopGet c [K.TermName2]
77getTermPairs = Rop.getFromTree K.treesFlatNamePairs
78
79-- | Get term names groups delimited by colons.
80getTermsColon :: Rop.RopGet c [[K.TermName]]
81getTermsColon = Rop.getFromTree K.treesNamesByColon
82
83-- | Get list of tree terms.
84getTermTrees :: Rop.RopGet c [K.Term K.Tree]
85getTermTrees = Rop.getFromTree K.treesTerms1
86
